DOC.brief_summary: To develop database peripheral choroidal circulation use ultra widefield ( UWF ) imaging . This database serve quantitative reference tool comparison subject database know normal subject .
DOC.criteria: Subjects older 20 year old good general health . Subject capable give consent . The subject able willing comply study procedure . Subjects ocular medium clear enough allow good quality ocular imaging . Normal subject know retinal choroidal disease . Subjects 20 year old . Subjects contraindication dilation . Subjects history epilepsy . Subjects know allergy iodine , shellfish intravenous xray contrast dye . Subjects may pregnant . Subjects past history vitreoretinal disease surgery retinal detachment , epiretinal membrane , vitreous hemorrhage . Subjects ocular condition interferes good quality image acquisition , corneal opacity , cataract , dense vitreous hemorrhage . Subjects evidence retinal optic nerve disease include glaucoma . Subjects anterior segment disease exception common ocular surface disorder ( blepharitis , dry eye ) . Subjects medical condition interfere subject 's compliance study procedure inability subject maintain steady head eye position patient ataxia nystagmus . Subjects history Diabetes , uncontrolled blood pressure ( define systolic > /= 160mmHg and/or diastolic > /= 90 mmHg ) , Vascular Disease ( cardiovascular , peripheral vascular , cerebrovascular ) . Subjects vasodilator . Subject 's refusal .
